trans-unit.source: Provides methods for encrypting and decrypting data.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于加密和解密数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in Microsoft Windows 2000 and later operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供访问到数据保护 API (DPAPI) 在 Microsoft Windows 2000 和更高版本操作系统中可用。

trans-unit.source: This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries.
trans-unit.target: 这是由操作系统提供，不需要额外的库的服务。

trans-unit.source: It provides protection using the user or machine credentials to encrypt or decrypt data.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了使用用户或计算机凭据进行加密或解密数据的保护。

trans-unit.source: The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 类包含两个包装的非托管的 DPAPI，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data such as passwords, keys, and connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法可以用于加密和解密数据，例如密码、 密钥和连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you use these methods during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state."
trans-unit.target: 如果在模拟期间使用这些方法，则可能收到以下错误:"该项不适于在指定状态。"

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the DPAPI stores the key data in user profiles.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况是因为 DPAPI 用户配置文件中存储的密钥数据。

trans-unit.source: If the profile is not loaded, DPAPI won’t be able to perform the decryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果未加载配置文件，DPAPI 将无法执行解密。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling either method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用任何一种方法之前模拟用户的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Using DPAPI with impersonation can incur significant complication and requires careful design choices.
trans-unit.target: 对模拟使用 DPAPI 会显著增加复杂性，并且需要仔细进行设计选择。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use data protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用数据保护。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加密数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: An optional additional byte array used to increase the complexity of the encryption, or <see langword="null" /> for no additional complexity.
trans-unit.target: 一个用来增加加密复杂度的可选的附加字节数组，或者是 <see langword="null" /> 如果不要增加复杂度。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of encryption.
trans-unit.target: 指定加密范围的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的字节数组中加密数据，并返回包含已加密数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: A byte array representing the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 表示已加密数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to encrypt data such as passwords, keys, or connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于加密数据，例如密码、 密钥或连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `optionalEntropy` parameter enables you to add data to increase the complexity of the encryption; specify `null` for no additional complexity.
trans-unit.target: `optionalEntropy`参数允许你添加数据，以增加加密的复杂性; 指定`null`不要增加复杂度。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this information must also be used when decrypting the data using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，此信息还必须使用时解密数据使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state."
trans-unit.target: 如果在模拟期间使用此方法，则可能收到以下错误:"该项不适于在指定状态。"

trans-unit.source: To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用方法之前模拟用户的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use data protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用数据保护。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userData" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The encryption failed.
trans-unit.target: 加密失败。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The system ran out of memory while encrypting the data.
trans-unit.target: 加密数据时系统内存不足。

trans-unit.source: with the associated <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute.ProtectData" /> flag for permission to protect data.
trans-unit.target: 使用关联<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute.ProtectData" />保护数据的权限的标志。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data encrypted using the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节数组，包含用 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope)" /> 方法加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: An optional additional byte array that was used to encrypt the data, or <see langword="null" /> if the additional byte array was not used.
trans-unit.target: 用于加密数据，或 <see langword="null" /> 的可选的额外的字节数组，如果不使用额外的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of data protection that was used to encrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于加密数据的数据保护范围的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the decrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的字节数组中解密数据，并返回包含已解密数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: A byte array representing the decrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 表示已解密数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to unprotect data that was encrypted using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于取消保护使用加密的数据进行<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `optionalEntropy` parameter was used during encryption, it must be supplied to unencrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果`optionalEntropy`在加密过程中使用了参数，必须提供解密数据。

trans-unit.source: If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state."
trans-unit.target: 如果在模拟期间使用此方法，则可能收到以下错误:"该项不适于在指定状态。"

trans-unit.source: To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用方法之前模拟用户的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use data protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据保护。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="encryptedData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="encryptedData" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The decryption failed.
trans-unit.target: 解密失败。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: 该操作系统不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Out of memory.
trans-unit.target: 内存不足。

trans-unit.source: with the associated <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute.UnprotectData" /> flag for permission to unprotect data.
trans-unit.target: 使用关联<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute.UnprotectData" />取消保护数据的权限的标志。
